Spotlight

Use the spotlight component to create a visual link to another page. The spotlight is shown as a block with an optional background image. By default, the complete spotlight is clickable. However, you can modify the spotlight component to be non-clickable.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-spotlight

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-spotlight

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-spotlight/src/scss/spotlight";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

There are a number of variants and variables to customize the spotlight component, e.g. the use of a link. If there is no link, then the styling will be slighty different. A spotlight component has the following variants:

  • .vl-spotlight--alt: a different background color and text color
  • .vl-spotlight--s: a smaller font than the default font
  • .vl-spotlight--l: a larger font than the default font

A spotlight component can contain the following elements:

  • Title: the spotlight title
  • Link: the (optional) spotlight link to another page
  • Image: the (optional) background image
  • Subtitle: the (optional) subtitle (in a smaller font below title)
  • Data: the content in 2 variants: data__value and data__subvalue.
  • Document: the link to a document, the document type and size are shown.
  • Text: any other text that does not fit in any of the above, can go here.

Premies voor renovatie

 
      
          
<a href="#" class="vl-spotlight vl-spotlight--s">
  <h3 class="vl-spotlight__title">Premies voor renovatie</h3></a>

Gezond bouwen en de juiste bouwmaterialen kiezen

      
          
  <article class="vl-spotlight vl-spotlight--s"
    role="none">
    <h3 class="vl-spotlight__title">Gezond bouwen en de juiste bouwmaterialen kiezen</h3></article>
